name: dwi2mask
description: Generates an whole brain mask from a DWI image.All diffusion weighted and b=0 volumes are used to obtain a mask that includes both brain tissue and CSF.

inputs.name: Input image
inputs.description: The input DWI image containing volumes that are both diffusion weighted and b=0.

inputs.name: Output image name
inputs.description: The output whole brain mask image name.

output-files.name: Output image
output-files.description: The output whole brain mask image
